title: Call Coordinator
tagsAndSkills: Inbound Customer Service,Ticketing Tools,Telecalling,Inbound Calls,Tools,Customer service,Ticketing,Coordination
jobDescription:
Promptly resolve customer tickets and be the first point of contact for customer escalations.

  • Coordinating with other departments to resolve customer issues.
  • Share learnings and best practices amongst team members including keeping internal knowledge.
  • Experience in or knowledge of cybersecurity assessments and incident management.
  • Understanding the cyber-security landscape including common threats and attack scenarios.
  • Experience with monitoring, ticketing, and CRM tools.
  • Strong team player with the flexibility to work in shifts in a 24x7x365 environment.
  • Strong communication skills including high proficiency in English-15%, Marathi-55% & Hindi-30%.
  • Ability to deal with multiple customer profiles and personalities.
  • Knowledge of Cloud security principles.
  • Domestic BPO, Voice Process, Flexibility to work all shifts.
  • Must be 18 years of age and legally authorized to work immediately.
  • BPO & Banking Sector Candidates are preferred.

title: Preschool Teacher  - Vasant Vihar Thane- (females Only)
tagsAndSkills: Preschool,Pre Primary,Montessori,Phonics,ecced,Day Care,Nursery,Early Childhood Education
jobDescription:
We are looking for Preschool Teacher (Only Females) for our following schools for our schools in :


  • Thane: Vasant Vihar

Roles & Responsibilities:
The Teacher will be responsible for the day to day class room activity for the schools and will have the following responsibilities:

Understanding the curriculum and implementing it in the class
Identifying the needs and interests of the children
Should have the ability to teach small kids


Desired Profile:

Minimum 1 to 10 years of related experience (Freshers are welcome)

Qualification: Any Graduate

Preferred ECCED, or any other related course
Self Motivated
Good Verbal & Written English Skills

Patience, Love for Kids
Energetic, it can be back breaking work running after the little ones.
Willingness to Learn - We are doing revolutionary stuff, so learning needs to be constant.


We will provide you the necessary inputs and training to make you an awesome Teacher.

So if you wish to join us in our revolution, please write to us at poonam@mindseed.in
